{{cpp/thread/stop_source/title|get_token}}
{{cpp/thread/stop_source/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
std::stop_token get_token() const noexcept;
}}

Returns a {{tt|stop_token}} object associated with the {{tt|stop_source}}'s stop-state, if the {{tt|stop_source}} has stop-state; otherwise returns a default-constructed (empty) {{tt|stop_token}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A {{tt|stop_token}} object, which will be empty if {{c|1=this-&gt;stop_possible() == false}}.
